title: Physical Location

xdm:id.title: Location Id
xdm:id.description: The unique identifier of the location.

xdm:description.title: Description
xdm:description.description: The description of the physical location.

xdm:address.title: Address
xdm:address.description: The physical address of the location.

xdm:locationCode.title: Location Code
xdm:locationCode.description: A short code that uniquely identifies this location.

xdm:shape.title: Geo Shape
xdm:shape.description: The geographic shape of the physical location.

xdm:pointOfInterest.title: Point of Interest
xdm:pointOfInterest.description: The coordinates of the point of interest for this location.

xdm:containedByLocation.title: Contained by Location
xdm:containedByLocation.description: A relation between this location and another one that contains it.

xdm:containsLocations.title: Contains Locations
xdm:containsLocations.description: An array of one or more physical locations that are contained in this one.
